name: Jo Baer
caption: Jo Baer (photo 2015)
summary: Josephine Gail Baer (born August 7, 1929) is an American painter whose works are associated with minimalist art. She began exhibiting her work at the Fischbach Gallery, New York, and other venues for contemporary art in the mid-1960s. In the mid-1970s, she turned away from non-objective painting. Since then, Baer has fused images, symbols, words, and phrases in a non-narrative manner, a mode of expression she once termed "radical figuration."
